title: What are the latest business news of August 22, 2020? - Quora

This acquisition holds 60% of its share capital.3) Oracle may acquire TikTok US operations.  4) Nearly 1.9 crore salaried people have lost their jobs in India since April, according to data released by private-think tank center for monitoring the Indian economy.  5) US-based short term home rental startup Airbnb announced that it has filed its IPO.
